CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='POLNAR', "Type B protects the OLT equipment with separate OLT blades. It offers automated switching and puts an additional PON port on the OLT.", IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='POL', "In this release Type-B protection is only supported for FGLT-B/C and FWLT-B, next release will also support Type-B protection for FGLT-D and FWLT-C."," "))
CustomField.label: Type B Protection Information
